LanguageData.SydailyFox.label: <color=#b487ff>SydailyFox</color>
LanguageData.SydailyFox.description:
Strange particles penetrate through the wall. 
A mysterious purple glow is shining through the dark. 

It looks like a fat RedFox, but unusually docile. 
（Even more obedient than some of our members.） 

Clearly visible on each side of Fox's cheek is a purple crystal... 
You feel a little cold... And you try to touch it... 
It's getting colder... and colder......
LanguageData.SydailyFox.tools.0.label: <color=#b487ff>CrystalTeeth</color>
LanguageData.SydailyFox.tools.1.label: Left paw
LanguageData.SydailyFox.tools.2.label: Right paw
